author: billbarker
msg: Add URLStreamHandlerFactory to allow all SSL options.
I got voted down on URL, so this will make both Costin and me happy.
This allows protocol handlers to be loaded from WEB-INF/lib.

author: larryi
msg: Add a release notes file to track changes since 3.3 release.

author: bojan
msg: Add a note about the minimum of two threads required to shutdown Tomcat through Ajp12

author: billbarker
msg: Allow encodeURL to work for Apache+tomcat under SSL without JSSE.
Now we use the connection-less URL class from the 4.0 branch to parse the input URL to decide if we can encode it.

author: billbarker
msg: Thanks to Craig for suggesting this as a fix for encodeURL when JSSE is not installed.
